content: this is a summary of a legal case regarding inheritance proceedings the deceased person whose name is not mentioned passed away without leaving a will they were married at the time of their death and had a son and a daughter according to the inheritance act the widow and descendants of the deceased are entitled to inherit with the widow receiving onethird of the estate during a hearing on february 10 2022 the heirs claimed their right to inherit and reached an agreement on the distribution of the estate the court determined the value of the estate based on the information and documentation provided the estimated net value of the estate was 11000 eur with a shareholding company valued at 9000 eur a court fee of 243 eur was assessed in accordance with the law on court fees one of the heirs whose name is not mentioned agreed to pay the court fee since the heirs did not appeal the decision made during the hearing it became final on february 10 2022
